commit.message:
functional (function<>::swap): Use std::swap.

2010-10-04  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	* include/std/functional (function<>::swap): Use std::swap.
	* include/tr1/functional (function<>::swap): Likewise.

From-SVN: r164952

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2010-10-04  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>
+
+	* include/std/functional (function<>::swap): Use std::swap.
+	* include/tr1/functional (function<>::swap): Likewise.
+
